title: Enterprise Services
caption: Delivering valuable insights to optimize operations
overview: At INTELLECT, our enterprise services cater to various models. These engagement models will be based on the value added as per customer  needs. Various models such as Onsite, Offshore and Offsite are available to meet the needs of customers. Various commercial models such as Time and Materials, Fixed Price, Risk and Rewards,Co-sourcing models are available for engagement.  Innovative commercial models based on Macro / Micro economic factors of the country to provide right support to customers as and when required.
solTitle: Converting raw data into actionable insights

services.title: Enterprise Consultancy
services.content: Consulting, Application Portfolio  Optimization, Product evaluation for  Enterprise products.

services.title: Enterprise Products
services.content: Configuring, Implementing, customizing,  testing, maintaining and supporting  Enterprise products such as Oracle,  Microsoft, SAP etc.

services.title: IV & V Services
services.content: Independent Verification and Validation  services utilizing latest test methodologies. Providing catalogue based testing services.

services.title: Managed Services
services.content: Dedicated and shared application support  services. Support provided is both onsite  and through INTELLECT support centres.
